net.dv8tion.jda.core.EmbedBuilder

    net.dv8tion.jda.core  

    • Uses of EmbedBuilder in net.dv8tion.jda.core

      Methods in net.dv8tion.jda.core that return EmbedBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.addBlankField(boolean inline)
      Adds a blank (empty) Field to the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.addField(MessageEmbed.Field field)
      Copies the provided Field into a new Field for this builder.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.addField(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, boolean inline)
      Adds a Field to the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.appendDescription(java.lang.CharSequence description)
      Appends to the description of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.clear()
      Resets this builder to default state.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.clearFields()
      Clears all fields from the embed, such as those created with the EmbedBuilder(MessageEmbed) constructor or via the addField methods.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setAuthor(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the Author of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setAuthor(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String url)
      Sets the Author of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setAuthor(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String iconUrl)
      Sets the Author of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setColor(java.awt.Color color)
      Sets the Color of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setDescription(java.lang.CharSequence description)
      Sets the Description of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setFooter(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String iconUrl)
      Sets the Footer of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setImage(java.lang.String url)
      Sets the Image of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setThumbnail(java.lang.String url)
      Sets the Thumbnail of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setTimestamp(java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor temporal)
      Sets the Timestamp of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Sets the Title of the embed.
      EmbedBuilder EmbedBuilder.setTitle(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String url)
      Sets the Title of the embed.
